text:
A PROPOSAL
FROM
THE NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF
EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
TO
THE DIRECTOR,
COMMUNICATIONS MEDIA
RESEARCH PROGRAM
OFFICE OF EDUCATION,
DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH..,
EDUCATION AND WELFARE
WASHINGTON 25, D.C.
REGARDING THE ROLE OF THE
NAEB
IN THE
NATIONAL DEFENSE EDUCATION ACT OF 1958
*****
OCTOBER 24, 1958
